channel.title: stl on MeVisLab Examples
channel.description: Recent content in stl on MeVisLab Examples

item.title: Example 1: 3D Printing in MeVisLab
item.description: Example 1: 3D Printing in MeVisLab Introduction This example uses the assimp library to load a 3D file and save the file as *.stl for 3D printing. Steps to do Develop your network Add the modules SoSceneLoader, SoBackground and SoExaminerViewer to your workspace and connect them as seen below. Example Network Open the 3D file Select the file vtkCow.obj from MeVisLab demo data directory. Open SoExaminerViewer and inspect the scene. You will see a 3D cow.
